title: #73: BONUS EPISODE - Profiler Reunion with Jim Fitzgerald
description:
In this episode, Jim Clemente welcomes great friend and career-long colleague Jim Fitzgerald to discuss cases they worked, Fitz new book and their upcoming new show, Manhunt: The Unabomber, premiering August 1st on Discovery Channel.


New to Real Crime Profile? Never miss an episode by subscribing today at smarturl.it/realcrime
